concept.title: Quarantine Gardening and Compost Projects
concept.shortdesc: Learn how to garden and compost while stuck in quarantine

conbody.p: If you're feeling down during quarantining at home, it's the perfect opportunity to grow some plants or learn how to compost. Watching your seeds sprout and your compost break down into plant superfood you'll actually use will help with the quarantine blues and give you something to look forward to.
